channel.title: F.F.S. Stop dividing credits into percentages!
channel.description: Stop it! Im sick of seeing all these noobs giving themselfs 1% credit for copying some shitty code.

item.title: F.F.S. Stop dividing credits into percentages!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:16, topic:327234”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=423628.msg3110869#msg3110869 date=1264535406]

how about instead of percentages they just do a list of names? or how about the don’t give credit for in the first place. No one needs credit.

[/quote]Key words, “How” and “About”. You’re suggesting, unless when you agree with people you suggest what they already suggested.

fuck it. Removed comment,[/quote]You could have just edited it. You always act as if people are attacking your posts. At least, I know I’m not. I’m just simply telling you that we’ve already stated what you have. Is it too difficult to accept replies? The question is rhetorical. Although, I’m hoping that you aren’t taking this personal, as you always seem to…

Read full topic

item.title: F.F.S. Stop dividing credits into percentages!
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“Telenim, post:11, topic:327234”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=423628.msg3110859#msg3110859 date=1264534882]

they added the faggotpercent system to show how much they think they did

+1, besides most people on mopar seem to be immature kids who want both acknowledgment and respect.

It should be:
List of Names (set it up like film credits, list the name and what they did) > Pie charts > Ven Diagram > Percentages.

how about instead of percentages they just do a list of names? or how about the don’t give credit for in the first place. No one needs credit.

[/quote]Another retarded post…[/quote]

its a opinion you idiot. Who died and made you god.

item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

idk why this pointless transition to random percentages of credits given was made

so they added the faggotpercent system to show how much they think they did

item.title: F.F.S. Stop dividing credits into percentages!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:7, topic:327234”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=423628.msg3110616#msg3110616 date=1264521425]
pfft noobs silabs been bitching about this for years.
[/quote]it’s funny how this shit never happened before moparscape server kiddies, people used to just credit their name and that was all that was needed.

idk why this pointless transition to random percentages of credits given was made[/quote]Because for some reason, this group of people (lest I say age), has some sort of attachment to adding things that aren’t necessary. They, for some reason, feel that adding something is defined as an improvement, when in reality improvement is only apparent when whatever is added actually IMPROVES it.

To be honest, it’s not even just in percentiles. Moparscape has the tenancy to make unnecessary additions to nearly everything possible. Servers, threads/topics, replies, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: F.F.S. Stop dividing credits into percentages!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

There’s a rule for it. Though, it’s one of the rules that mods are lenient about, else, don’t care about at all.

9) The “leeched” concept.

[quote=“Thug-life”]Percentages:
Just name the people you are crediting, don’t bother making up random percentages unless you can provide the equations on how you get these percentages.[/quote]

Read full topic
